name: Alyx Stubbers
tooltip:
Acts as liaison between SAWE international and chapter.
Attends International Board of Directors Meeting.
Prepares annual chapter report.

name: Tom Tanner
tooltip:
Schedules and runs chapter meetings.
Creates meeting agendas and presentations.
Sends out invitations to events.
Finds presenters.
Promotes membership.
Ensures smooth transition at end of term.

name: Ross Campbell
tooltip:
Fills in for President in their absence.
Manages chapter projects.

name: Joshua McElveen
tooltip:
Takes meeting minutes and sends to Webmaster.
Produces meeting flyers and supplies them to the President and Webmaster.
Takes pictures at events.

name: Adam Cox
tooltip:
Maintains bank account and reports balance.
Maintains membership rolls and actively promotes renewal.
Makes and receives payments for services, meeting fees, etc.
